descriptionHtml:
Currently unvoiced and has no special dialogue, and no quest. Working on it. Have a decently big quest planned out, too.

Requires Enhanced Character Edit for the nose mesh, but this is not a hard dependency; your game will not crash without it, he just will not look right.

I recommend either Fine Faces by Urshi or MacKorns Real Skin for Men. I use Mac\'s. 

For the scars, I recommend Xenius\' replacers. Vanilla ones look like poop. Bethsoft is lazy.
author: theshewolf
